item.title: Pk points
item.dc:creator: @co_pked co pked
item.description:
@co_pked wrote:

well im having this probmle but i dont know how to fix it… i wanna add 10 pk points everytime he kill some1…? heres the death code which mite be related?

public void killmessage() { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; client playerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; int message = misc.random(8); if(message == 0) { killerz.sM("With a crushing blow, you defeat " + playerName + "."); killerz.sM("You now have @red@"+killerz.pkpoints+"@bla@ points and @red@"+killerz.Wins+"@bla@ Wins."); } else if(message == 1) { killerz.sM("It's a humiliating defeat for " + playerName + "."); killerz.sM("You now have @red@"+killerz.pkpoints+"@bla@ points and @red@"+killerz.Wins+"@bla@ Wins."); } else if(message == 2) { killerz.sM("" + playerName + " didn't stand a chance against you."); killerz.sM("You now have @red@"+killerz.pkpoints+"@bla@ points and @red@"+killerz.Wins+"@bla@ Wins."); } else if(message == 3) { killerz.sM("You have defeated " + playerName + "."); killerz.sM("You now have @red@"+killerz.pkpoints+"@bla@ points and @red@"+killerz.Wins+"@bla@ Wins."); } else if(message == 4) { killerz.sM("" + playerName + " regrets the day they met you in combat."); killerz.sM("You now have @red@"+killerz.pkpoints+"@bla@ points and @red@"+killerz.Wins+"@bla@ Wins."); } else if(message == 5) { killerz.sM("It's all over for " + playerName + "."); killerz.sM("You now have @red@"+killerz.pkpoints+"@bla@ points and @red@"+killerz.Wins+"@bla@ Wins."); } else if(message == 6) { killerz.sM("" + playerName + " falls before your might."); killerz.sM("You now have @red@"+killerz.pkpoints+"@bla@ points and @red@"+killerz.Wins+"@bla@ Wins."); } else if(message == 7) { killerz.sM("Can anyone defeat you? Certainly not " + playerName + "."); killerz.sM("You now have @red@"+killerz.pkpoints+"@bla@ points and @red@"+killerz.Wins+"@bla@ Wins."); } else if(message == 8) { killerz.sM("You were clearly a better fighter than " + playerName + "."); killerz.sM("You now have @red@"+killerz.pkpoints+"@bla@ points and @red@"+killerz.Wins+"@bla@ Wins."); }

Read full topic
